definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
popular science/popularization of science/abbr. of 科學普及|科学普及
ordinary person/private citizen/people/the person in the street
Mandarin (common language)/Putonghua (common speech of the Chinese language)/ordinary speech
Pu'er tea from the Pu'er region of Yunnan
to promote knowledge of laws/rights awareness

sentences.english: The broad seal was impressed with Winthrop's coat of arms.
sentences.chinese: 碩大的火漆封蠟上蓋着溫思羅普的紋章。

sentences.english: Stoneking of the Max Planck Institute.
sentences.chinese: 馬普學會的斯托金博士說。

sentences.english: He claimed to be s Scot but had a powerful Liverpool accent.
sentences.chinese: 他說自己是蘇格蘭人，卻有着濃重的利物普口音。

sentences.english: Puhakka was active in front service practically all war time.
sentences.chinese: 普哈克在整個戰爭期間都在前線積極戰鬥。

sentences.english: Industry insiders predict that China will see a new round of drink mark-ups after the Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 業內人士預計春節後將現各類飲料普漲潮。

sentences.english: If the dog is wearing Gucci, the kids aren’t wearing Gap.
sentences.chinese: 要是狗都穿古琦，那人還會穿蓋普嗎。

sentences.english: She was tormented by jealousy, just like suspicion of Procris towards her husband.
sentences.chinese: 她爲嫉妒所折磨，就像普洛克里斯猜疑她的丈夫一樣。

sentences.english: Both he and Tord Grip gew up supporting the Reds.
sentences.chinese: 他和助手格里普從小都是紅軍的支持者。

sentences.english: Paul the apostle understands the impact of writing love letters to churches in Philippi, Corinth, e.t.c.
sentences.chinese: 保羅明白寫情書到菲裏普教堂的影響。

sentences.english: “This is a striking change,” Professor Prasad said.
sentences.chinese: 這是個很大的改變“，普薩拉教授說。”

sentences.english: The picture at which you are looking was painted by Picasso.
sentences.chinese: 你在看的那張圖畫是普拉索畫的。

sentences.english: Those strict proprieties of the old days are now regarded as a Procrustean bed.
sentences.chinese: 那些老規矩現在被認爲是普洛克路斯特斯之牀。

sentences.english: At least Mr. Crapser has a birth mother waiting for him.
sentences.chinese: 至少，克拉普塞爾還有個生母在等他。

sentences.english: The woman took the rose, she kissed Ostap and she slowly rode away.
sentences.chinese: 女人拿了薔薇，吻了奧斯塔普，騎着馬慢慢地走了。

sentences.english: The gymnastic testing standard should change according to the development of the times.
sentences.chinese: 體操普修課的考覈標準應隨時代的發展而變化。

sentences.english: The phonetic component of a Chinese character.

definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
